full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 97-17 Filed 12/14/20 Page 5 of 5 Social Media Threats JUL 21, 2019 This crazy, pedophile, pimp, bitch, #GhislaineMaxwell, just said, "The #Ocean is too big to fail..." #OhNoSheDidnt #DeathPenalty Meanwhile, the very program she discusses was recently suspended, on July... huffpost.com/entry/ghislain... AUG 12, 2019 Can I just say here that I hope #GhislaineMaxwell is the first of the bunch!! She just needs to be made someone's bitch for arranging AND participating in the sexual assault of juveniles with one Jeffrey Epstein. Rot in jail access to nothing. vice.com/en_us/article/... AUG 14, 2019 [deleted] 9 points 1 year ago - edited 1 year ago The bigger question is .... HOW THE FUCK IS THIS SUBHUMAN CUNT NOT IN CUSTODY BEING GRILLED??? In the Epstein Case, she is "Person #2", second only to the person whose name is the fucking case. If dead, so now she's "Person #1" in the Epstein Case. Yet she is sitting at home, with her feet up, with nary a care in the world .... AUG 14, 2019 SHE'S HERE in #Massachusetts ?! The bitch #GhislaineMaxwell who #SexTrafficked young girls for #Epstein ?!?! Why the hell isn't she being brought in for questioning @ManchesterMAPD ?! WE DO NOT WANT HER HERE! #SleezyLeach She is CLOSE ENOUGH to me, I could grab her myself! AUG 15, 2019 they need to get this bitch n string her up by her neck... fuckin monster...... #GhislaineMaxwell MAR 19, 2020 Ghislaine Maxwell, citing death threats and extensive legal fees, sues Jeffrey Epstein's estate I hope someone finds her and kills her. That would be justice. Obviously her lawyers know's where she is, someone should stick them up to batteries untill we find out where she is. DOJ-OGR-00002079

additional_notes: The document appears to be a compilation of social media posts and online comments related to Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The tone of the comments is overwhelmingly negative and threatening towards Ghislaine Maxwell. The document is likely part of a legal case or investigation.
